name: Related Purchase Order Number
title: RPON
definition: Identifies the PON of a related Access Service Request.
usageNotes: Required when the ACT field is “D” and the CCVN   field is populated.
Required when the NOR field is populated.
Required when the first position of the TQ field is   “A”.
Required when the ATN field on the Transport   Form is “N”.
Required when the REL TSC field on the Trunking   Form is “N”.
fieldNotes: The RPON field may be used for relating both “N”   and “D” Access Service Requests that change a   location (different premises) of an existing service.

The RPON field may be used to relate intrastate   and interstate requests for a mixed group such as   for Feature Group A service when ordered using   separate Access Service Requests or relating   requests with firm orders.
When the CCVN field is populated the RPON field   for the disconnect ASR must contain the new   connect ASR PON. The RPON field of the new   connect ASR may contain the disconnect ASR PON.
When the TQ field is “A” the RPON field will   contain the PON of the ASR which has the TQ   General Section.   This rule takes precedence over   any other RPON value.
